name: max_rev
description: Програма повинна знайти найбільший елемент массиву b.
simplifyPrefix: (DEFPRED (EX a b m Arr)) (BG_PUSH (FORALL (a b m Arr) (PATS (EX a b m Arr)) (AND (IMPLIES (> a b) (IFF (EX a b m Arr) FALSE)) (IMPLIES (<= a b) (IFF (EX a b m Arr) (OR (EX (+ a 1) b m Arr) (EQ (select Arr a) m)))))))
